entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 6:00 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: NE 31 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023
